00044 #define ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT   2u
00045 
00050 #define ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT   1u
00051 
00056 #define ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT            4u
00057 
00061 #define ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_GLOBAL_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID    CCPU_TO_LE16(0xfffd)
00062 
00066 #define ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_IDENTIFY_TIME_ATTRIBUTE_ID             CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0000)
00067 
00072 #define ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_IDENTIFY_QUERY_RESPONSE_COMMAND_ID     0x00u
00073

00079 #define ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_IDENTIFY_QUERY_COMMAND_ID              0x01u
00080 #define ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_TRIGGER_EFFECT_COMMAND_ID              0x40u
00081 
00082 /*
00083  *\brief ZCL Idetify Cluster server side attributes defining macros
00084  */
00085 
00086 #define ZCL_DEFINE_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES() \
00087   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(identifyTime,   ZCL_READWRITE_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_IDENTIFY_TIME_ATTRIBUTE_ID,          ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00088   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(clusterVersion, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE,  ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_GLOBAL_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID)
00089 
00090 /*
00091  *\brief ZCL Idetify Cluster client side attributes defining macros
00092  */
00093 
00094 #define ZCL_DEFINE_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES() \
00095   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(clusterVersion, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_GLOBAL_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID)
00096 
00097 /*
00098  * \brief ZCL Identify Cluster commands defining macros
00099  */
00100 
00101 #define ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_COMMANDS(identifyCommandInd, identifyQueryCommandInd, triggerEffectCommandInd, identifyQueryResponseCommandInd) \
00102     DEFINE_COMMAND(identifyCommand,              0x00, COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_NO_ACK), identifyCommandInd), \
00103     DEFINE_COMMAND(identifyQueryCommand,         0x01, COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK),       identifyQueryCommandInd), \
00104     DEFINE_COMMAND(triggerEffectCommand,         0x40, COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_NO_ACK), triggerEffectCommandInd), \
00105     DEFINE_COMMAND(identifyQueryResponseCommand, 0x00, COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK),    identifyQueryResponseCommandInd)
00106 
00107 #define IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00108   { \
00109     .id               = IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_ID, \
00110     .options          = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00111     .attributesAmount = ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00112     .attributes       = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00113     .commandsAmount   = ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00114     .commands         = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00115   }
00116 
00117 #define IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00118   { \
00119     .id               = IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_ID, \
00120     .options          = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00121     .attributesAmount = ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00122     .attributes       = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00123     .commandsAmount   = ZCL_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00124     .commands         = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00125   }
00126 
00127 #define DEFINE_IDENTIFY_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)
